version_description:
Introduced a new app design to our home page
Included an improved Token allocation algorithm for our Daily Hunt
Introduced a new design to the confirmation and rejection pages in the wallet.
Included an improved navigation experience for the country list within login and registration
Introduced a $CHZ details section within each Token Transaction details
Addressed a couple of usability bugs.
Reduced the size of the application.

Introduced a new app design to our home page
Included an improved Token allocation algorithm for our Daily Hunt
Introduced a new design to the confirmation and rejection pages in the wallet.
Included an improved navigation experience for the country list within login and registration
Introduced a $CHZ details section within each Token Transaction details
Addressed a couple of usability bugs.
Reduced the size of the application.

App performance improvements (network issues).
Minor bug fixes.
No new features.

App performance improvements (network issues).
Minor bug fixes.
No new features.
Improvement of the Token Hunt feature to allow catching tokens at home.
Improvement of the Token Hunt feature to allow catching tokens at home.

Easy access from the Home page to those teams where you are a Fan Token holder
Improvements to KYC level 2 feature by addressing a number of related fixes
Improved experience for those who may not have allowed camera access to Socios and now need to access it.
Ability to view the changes in Fan Token value

Easy access from the Home page to those teams where you are a Fan Token holder
Improvements to KYC level 2 feature by addressing a number of related fixes
Improved experience for those who may not have allowed camera access to Socios and now need to access it.
Ability to view the changes in Fan Token value

New buttons for Add $CHZ, Exchange Tokens and Vote now available on the Home page
Ability to sell Tokens within the Socios.com platform
Stability improvements
Bug Fixes

New buttons for Add $CHZ, Exchange Tokens and Vote now available on the Home page
Ability to sell Tokens within the Socios.com platform
Stability improvements
Bug Fixes

Releasing new version of Socios.com app!
It comes with iOS 14 support, stability improvements and with new security feature - FaceID & TouchID.

Releasing new version of Socios.com app!
It comes with iOS 14 support, stability improvements and with new security feature - FaceID & TouchID.
Bug fix for mobile notifications
Bug fix for mobile notifications
Minor improvements and bug fixes
Minor improvements and bug fixes

Support for Polish Language
Minor bug fixes and improvements

Support for Polish Language
Minor bug fixes and improvements
This version includes a couple of improvements to our User Verification flow, a change to our Socios.com app icon and some minor bug fixes.
This version includes a couple of improvements to our User Verification flow, a change to our Socios.com app icon and some minor bug fixes.
v2.7.6 of the app allows users to select their Favourite team, have the ability to opt-in or opt-out of partner related notifications as well as included some minor bug fixes.
v2.7.6 of the app allows users to select their Favourite team, have the ability to opt-in or opt-out of partner related notifications as well as included some minor bug fixes.

Loyalty points feature
Bug fixes and improvements

Loyalty points feature
Bug fixes and improvements
New version of the app bring you new feature. Allowing you to participate with other Socios.com users on the outcome of Euro 2020 cup and win prizes!
New version of the app bring you new feature. Allowing you to participate with other Socios.com users on the outcome of Euro 2020 cup and win prizes!
Did you miss out on buying Fan Tokens in our last FTO because you got stuck in the queue? You’ll now be able to try again almost immediately!
Did you miss out on buying Fan Tokens in our last FTO because you got stuck in the queue? You’ll now be able to try again almost immediately!
Did you always want to collect items from your favourite team? We’re launching the digital collectibles section and you’ll soon be able to win the first ones!
Did you always want to collect items from your favourite team? We’re launching the digital collectibles section and you’ll soon be able to win the first ones!
This version adding possibility to Send Out your digital collectibles and various stability improvements.
This version adding possibility to Send Out your digital collectibles and various stability improvements.
How is your team going to do? We’re launching the new football predictor to test your football knowledge! We have also fixed a couple defects.
